reviews.subject: Data Structures
reviews.review: Dr. Smith explains complex topics very clearly and is always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Thermodynamics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable and engaging, but sometimes hard to follow during lectures.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Good professor, but grading is very tough and the exams are difficult.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Her lectures are interesting and she encourages student participation.

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: The class is very challenging and the professor is not very approachable.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've ever had. She makes difficult concepts easy to understand.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: The content is interesting, but his lectures can be a bit dry at times.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Great professor! She really knows how to make the subject engaging.

reviews.subject: Linear Algebra
reviews.review: Difficult to follow his lectures and his explanations are often unclear.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is very passionate about the subject and it shows in her teaching.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Philosophy
reviews.review: He is knowledgeable, but his grading is tough and participation is mandatory.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Explains the material well and is always willing to help students outside of class.

reviews.subject: Ethics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair exams. Really makes you think critically.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Very organized and clear, but the exams are quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Lectures can be dull, but the content is important and relevant.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: She makes difficult topics understandable and is very approachable.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Very passionate about the subject and really cares about his students.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Literature
reviews.review: Her feedback is helpful, but the readings can be overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Discrete Mathematics
reviews.review: Great professor with clear explanations. The assignments are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: One of the best! She really knows her stuff and is great at explaining complex concepts.
